TopicTitle: 0.25 not loading menus and icons in game

Articles.Content:
My version of 0.25 runs super duper crazy slow even with reduced graphics. And many menus or windows don't pop up.

For example, if I select load, no window appears. But if I click around something will load, but not for like 5 minutes. And then the game moves at like 05 FPS.

In the VAB I don't see the staging icons on the right. When I launch, I see no interface at all. No staging, no navball, no altimeter, nothing.

Win XP 32 bit, Lenovo laptop. The game isn't crashing but just not working properly I tried reinstalling with no luck. I haven't added any mods.

I wanna bomb the VAB : (
